title: Les Annees Folles = the Crazy Years
brief_description:
The Roaring Twenties (The Crazy Years) were a time of carefree living, unbridled creativity and political upheaval. This documentary is a made up of a compilation of newsreels from the archives of Pathe and Gaumont.

Credits: Directors, Henri Torrent, Mirea Alexandresco ; music, Georges Van Parys, Georges Tzipine ; narration, Serge Reggiani.
